document.full_text: credit suisse must pay hundreds of millions of dollars to a semiconductor manufacturer over failed auction-rate securities, though a u.s. appeals court on thursday reduced an arbitrator's award against the bank by roughly $75 million.
document.title: credit suisse can't dodge auction-rate payout: court
lines_and_colors: credit suisse must pay hundreds of millions of dollars to a semiconductor manufacturer over failed auction-rate securities, though a u.s. appeals court on thursday reduced an arbitrator's award against the bank by roughly $75 million.
